(e.g. planned investigations and/or spec: (e.g. planned investigations and/or specialist consultations, reason for unknown prognosis and/or frequency, etc.)
(e.g. planned investigations and/or specialist consultations, reason for unknown prognosis and/or frequency, etc.).
* If prognosis and/or frequency is unkno: * If prognosis and/or frequency is unknown, please explain why in Section 7 - Other relevant information.
<strong>Grave</strong> - for the purpose: Grave - for the purpose of CPP, grave is defined as a condition that is included in the list of 32 severe and rapidly progressive medical conditions in Annex A. If yes, provide details in Section 5 - Medical conditions, impairments, functional limitations and treatment.
<strong>Terminal</strong> - for the purp: Terminal - for the purpose of CPP, terminal is defined as a disease state that cannot be cured or adequately treated and is reasonably expected to result in death within 6 months. If yes, provide details below:
Applications from patients with a termin: Applications from patients with a terminal illness or a grave condition receive priority handling. In these cases, once we receive a complete application, including the Medical Report, our goal is to determine the applicant's eligibility for CPP disability benefits within 5 business days for applicants with a terminal illness and 30 calendar days for those with a grave condition.

app.title: Medical report for Canada Pension Plan Disability Benefits
conditions.all_conditions_message: Service Canada needs to know all of %s's current mental and physical conditions
conditions.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this condition?
conditions.intro: Provide all the conditions that are currently affecting your patient, starting with the greatest functional impact.
conditions.title: Medical conditions
confirmation.download_the_medical_report: Download the medical report for your records
confirmation.title: You have submitted %s's medical report
confirmation.what_happens_next_1: Service Canada will begin assessing %s's application for Canada Pension Plan Disability Benefits. Service Canada might contact you in the future if they need any further information about %s's health or work capacity.
confirmation.what_happens_next_2: The unique code you used is now disabled – you can no longer access or edit the medical report.
confirmation.you_have_submitted: You have submitted a medical report to support %s's application for Canada Pension Plan Disability Benefits.
consent.accountant: my accountant or bookkeeper for information on self-employment
consent.compensation_boards: provincial or territorial workers' compensation boards
consent.education: educational institutions or other vocational agencies
consent.government: federal, provincial, territorial, or municipal government departments and agencies
consent.i_understand_1: will make a decision based on the available information on my file;
consent.i_understand_2: may stop paying me the benefits if I am already receiving them; and
consent.i_understand_3: can require that I provide the necessary information.
consent.i_understand_intro: I understand that if I do not give my consent, Service Canada:
consent.may_contact_preamble: For this reason, Service Canada may contact any of the following persons and organizations if necessary:
consent.no: No, I do not give my consent.
consent.optional_parties_preamble: Service Canada may also need to contact the organizations and persons listed below. Deselect any organizations and persons that Service Canada may not contact.
consent.practioners: medical doctors, nurse practitioners, consultant specialists, or other health care professionals
consent.preamble: Service Canada is authorized under Section 68 and 69 of the Canada Pension Plan (CPP) Regulations to receive personal information (medical and non-medical) about you to determine if you qualify or continue to qualify for CPP disability benefits. Your consent to permit Service Canada to obtain this information is necessary, should Service Canada need this information from persons and organizations listed below.
consent.question: Do you give your consent to Service Canada to obtain medical and other personal information about you from the persons and organizations listed above?
consent.signature_draw_instructions: Draw your signature with your mouse, touchpad, or screen.
consent.signature_option: How would you like to give your signature?
consent.title: Consent for Service Canada to obtain personal information
consent.valid_period: Your consent is valid for up to 3 years unless you cancel it
consent.yes: Yes, I give my consent. I understand that this information may help determine if I qualify or continue to qualify for CPP disability benefits.
dashboard.consent: has given consent for Service Canada to obtain personal information about them.
dashboard.expedited-processing: Expedited processing for terminal and grave conditions
dashboard.intro2: as you can, even if you do not think it is relevant.
dashboard.intro4: is eligible for Canada Pension Plan Disability Benefits, based on the detail you provide.
dashboard.pay: Service Canada will pay up to $85 directly to you once you’ve completed this medical report.
dashboard.privacy: Pursuant to the Privacy Act, upon written request, Service Canada is obligated to provide the applicant or their representative with any information or records, including medical reports, contained in their file (Personal Information Bank ESDC PPU 146). Find more information regarding the Privacy Act.
dashboard.title: Medical report for Canada Pension Plan Disability Benefits
declaration.billing_id_type: Which type of identification number would you like to enter?
declaration.billing_instructions: To compensate you for completing the report, Service Canada will pay up to $85 directly to you. For income tax purposes, your invoice must include one identification number.
declaration.billing_invoice: Optionally, you may upload an invoice if your billing process requires it.
declaration.i_confirm_that: I confirm that, to the best of my knowledge all of the information I have provided in this report is accurate and complete
declaration.review_and_confirm: Review and confirm the contents of this medical report before submitting to Service Canada.
declaration.title: Declaration and review
delcaration.billing_gst_hst: Goods and Services Tax (GST) / Harmonized Sales Tax (HST) number

documents.sub: These could include: clinical notes, specialist reports or hospital discharge reports, etc
documents.title: Supporting documents
documents.which_condition: Which conditions does this refer to?
errors.application_submitted_already: A medical report has already been submitted using the unique code you entered and cannot be accessed. Call Service Canada at 1-800-277-9914 if you have any questions.
errors.condition_outlook_unknown: Tell us why the prognosis is unknown
errors.functional.limitations.length: Enter as much information as you can about your patient's functional limitations and restrictions.
errors.functional.plannedTreatments.leng: Tell us if you have planned future treatments that might improve or restrict your patient's functional abilities.
errors.medication_frequency.length: Tell us how often your patient takes this medication.
errors.medication_name.length: Enter the name of a medication your petient is taking, or was taking.
errors.medication_results.length: Tell us how the patient reacted to this medication.
errors.medication_start_date.length: Enter the date your patient started taking this medication.
errors.medication_treated_condition.is_c: Select at least one condition this medication treats, or add a condition.
errors.missing_billing_id: You must enter an identication number
errors.missing_billing_id_type: You must choose an identification number type
errors.no_application_found: No medical report was found with this code and birthdate
errors.notify_type: Please indicate how you would like to receive notifications
errors.patient_birthdate_is_required: Patient Date of Birth is required
errors.patient_birthdate_not_formated_co: Patient Date of Birth is not formatted correctly
errors.patient_birthdate_not_valid: Patient Date of Birth is not a valid date
errors.send_notifications.valid: Please indicate if you would like to receive notifications
errors.symptoms_occur_unknown_required: Tell us why the frequency of symptoms is unknown
errors.treatment_frequency.length: Tell us how often your patient received this treatment, even if it was only once.
errors.treatment_results.length: Tell us how the patient reacted to this treatment.
errors.treatment_start_date.length: Enter the date your patient started this treatment, even if it started and finished the same day.
errors.treatment_treated_condition.is_ch: Select at least one condition this treatment was for, or add a condition.
errors.treatment_type.length: Enter a type of treatment your patient has tried.
errors.work.return_to_work: Select an option to tell us if you think your patient will be able to return to work.
errors.work.return_to_work_timeframe: Select an estimate of when you think your patient will return to work.
errors.work.return_to_work_type: Select an option to tell us if your patient will be able to return to the same type of work, or something different.
form.fullname.desc: Enter your name as it appears on your passport
form.medicaiton_results.desc: Describe the patient's response to this medication
form.medication_frequency.hint: For example: 'daily' or 'every other day', etc
form.medication_results.hint: For example: 'caused dizziness' or 'limited improvement', etc
form.medication_treated_conditions.quest: Which condition(s) does this medication treat?
form.notify_by.desc: You can select as many as you like.
form.send_notifications: Would you like to receive notifications?
form.send_notifications.desc: You can choose how you get these later.
functional.limitations: In regard to seeking and maintaining employment, does %s currently experience any functional limitations or restrictions?
functional.limitations_hint:
Provide as much detail as you can about the following domains:
  • mobility or physical abilities (e.g. walking, gripping, driving, staring at a screen etc.)
  • communication and thinking abilities (e.g. listening, recall, concentrating, learning etc.)
  • behavioural or emotional abilities (e.g. impulse control, energy and drive, trust etc.)
  • activities of daily living (e.g. feeding, toileting, grooming, taking meds etc.)
functional.plannedTreatments: Are there any treatments planned that you reasonably expect will improve or further restrict %s's functional abilities?
functional.title: Functional limitations and restrictions
invite.code_loss_instruction: If you lose your code, or it expires, fill out this form again to generate another code.
invite.complete_sections: Complete the sections to provide information about your patient's health and ability to work.
invite.enter_the_code: Enter the code '%s' and your patient's date of birth.
invite.give_code: To finish your medical report, give this code to your doctor or nurse practitioner.
invite.give_code_details: They will use this code to fill out their part of the medical report form, and send it to us at Service Canada.
invite.medical_professional_instruction: Your doctor or nurse practioner will use this unique code to fill out a report about your medical condition(s), and how they impact your ability to work.
invite.no_consent_1: You did not give consent for Service Canada to request more information.
invite.no_consent_2: Service Canada will make a decision on your application based only on the information you have given in your application form.
invite.no_consent_3: if you change your mind and would like to give your consent.
invite.title: Give this code to your doctor or nurse practitioner

medical_professional.instructions_1: As a doctor or nurse practitioner, Service Canada needs you to provide medical information about your patient. This is to get a better idea of your patient's health and functional abilities in relation to their work capacity.
medical_professional.instructions_2: To support your patient's application for Canada Pension Plan Disability Benefits, enter the unique code they gave you, and their date of birth.

section4.instructions_1: This section should be completed ONLY if your patient has been diagnosed with a terminal illness or one of the 32 grave conditions listed in Annex A. If your patient does not have a terminal illness or a grave condition, skip to Section 5 - Medical conditions, impairments, functional limitations and treatment.
section4.instructions_2: Applications from patients with a terminal illness or a grave condition receive priority handling. In these cases, once we receive a complete application, including the Medical Report, our goal is to determine the applicant's eligibility for CPP disability benefits within 5 business days for applicants with a terminal illness and 30 calendar days for those with a grave condition.
section4.question: Does your patient have a medical condition that is:
section4.terminal_instructions: If the patient has other non-terminal medical conditions that prevent them from regularly working at any job, please provide details in Section 5 - Medical conditions, impairments, functional limitations and treatment. Otherwise, please skip to Section 6 - Patient's employment situation.
section4.title: Expedited processing for terminal and grave conditions
section4.yes_grave: Grave - for the purpose of CPP, grave is defined as a condition that is included in the list of 32 severe and rapidly progressive medical conditions in Annex A. If yes, provide details in Section 5 - Medical conditions, impairments, functional limitations and treatment.
section4.yes_terminal: Terminal - for the purpose of CPP, terminal is defined as a disease state that cannot be cured or adequately treated and is reasonably expected to result in death within 6 months. If yes, provide details below:

start.how_it_works_list:
1. Fill out this form with your contact details to start the process and generate a unique code.
  2. Give the code to your doctor or nurse practitioner.
  3. Your doctor or nurse practitioner fills out their part of the medical report form.
start.instruction_overview: As part of your application for Canada Pension Plan Disability Benefits, you need to ask your doctor or nurse practitioner to send us a medical report.
start.lost_code_message: If you've lost your unique code, generate another one here and give that to your doctor or nurse practitioner instead.
start.title: Request a medical report for your Canada Pension Plan Disability Benefits application
